attributes.action: Proceed with Priory Integrated College (Holywood) New Build
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Department of Education recently announced a review of its decision to provide a new build for the school.

Priory Integrated College offers the young people of North Down high quality teaching and learning experiences.  It is North Down’s only integrated college and promotes a culture of tolerance, mutual understanding and inter-relationships through significant and purposeful learning due to its inclusive ethos.

I believe the Department of Education should honour its promise to provide a learning environment for the young people of North Down that will meet the educational requirements of the 21st Century.
